text: g of L1 - Anterior wedging of L2 - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Broad ribs - Cardiomyopathy - Cervical myelopathy - Depressed nasal bridge - Dermatan sulfate excretion in urine - Disproportionate short-trunk short stature - Dolichocephaly - Dysostosis multiplex - Epiphyseal dysplasia - Flared iliac wings - Glaucoma - Hepatomegaly - Hip dysplasia - Hirsutism - Hydrocephalus - Hypoplasia of the odontoid process - Hypoplastic acetabulae - Hypoplastic iliac wing - Inguinal hernia - Joint stiffn
